name: Volreg
author: Nipype (interface)
description:
Volreg, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.afni.preprocess, interface: Volreg).
Register input volumes to a base volume using AFNI 3dvolreg command
For complete details, see the `3dvolreg Documentation. <https://afni.nimh.nih.gov/pub/dist/doc/program_help/3dvolreg.html>`_

inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Basefile
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Base file for registration.

inputs.name: Copyorigin
inputs.description: A boolean. Copy base file origin coords to output.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Input file to 3dvolreg.

inputs.name: In weight volume
inputs.description: A tuple of the form: (a pathlike object or string representing an existing file, an integer) or a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Weights for each voxel specified by a file with an optional volume number (defaults to 0).

inputs.name: In weight volume
inputs.description: A tuple of the form: (a pathlike object or string representing an existing file, an integer) or a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Weights for each voxel specified by a file with an optional volume number (defaults to 0).

inputs.name: Interp
inputs.description: 'fourier' or 'cubic' or 'heptic' or 'quintic' or 'linear'. Spatial interpolation methods [default = heptic].

inputs.name: Num threads
inputs.description: An integer. Set number of threads.

inputs.name: Timeshift
inputs.description: A boolean. Time shift to mean slice time offset.

inputs.name: Verbose
inputs.description: A boolean. More detailed description of the process.

inputs.name: Zpad
inputs.description: An integer. Zeropad around the edges by 'n' voxels during rotations.

output-files.name: Md1d file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Max displacement output file.

output-files.name: Oned file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. 1d movement parameters output file.

output-files.name: Oned matrix save
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Save the matrix transformation.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output image file name.

output-files.name: Md1d file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Max displacement info file.

output-files.name: Oned file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Movement parameters info file.

output-files.name: Oned matrix save
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Matrix transformation from base to input.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Registered file.
